pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū anācāraṃ ācaritvā ekamekassa kamme kayiramāne paṭikkosanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena saṃgho sannipatito hoti kenacideva karaṇīyena.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:1.4: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū cīvarakammaṃ karontā ekassa chandaṃ adaṃsu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:1.6: “ayaṃ, āvuso, chabbaggiyo bhikkhu ekako āgato, handassa mayaṃ kammaṃ karomā”ti tassa kammaṃ akāsi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:1.7: Atha kho so bhikkhu yena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū tenupasaṅkami.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:1.13: Sace ca mayaṃ jāneyyāma ‘tuyhaṃ kammaṃ karissatī’ti, na mayaṃ chandaṃ dadeyyāmā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:1.14: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:1.15: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū dhammikānaṃ kammānaṃ chandaṃ datvā pacchā khīyanadhammaṃ āpajjissantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:1.16: “saccaṃ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, dhammikānaṃ kammānaṃ chandaṃ datvā pacchā khīyanadhammaṃ āpajjathā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:1.19: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, dhammikānaṃ kammānaṃ chandaṃ datvā pacchā khīyanadhammaṃ āpajjissatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:1.21: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:1.22: “Yo pana bhikkhu dhammikānaṃ kammānaṃ chandaṃ datvā pacchā khīyanadhammaṃ āpajjeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:2.1.6: apalokanakammaṃ ñattikammaṃ ñattidutiyakammaṃ ñatticatutthakammaṃ dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena kataṃ, etaṃ dhammikaṃ nāma kammaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:2.2.1: Dhammakamme dhammakammasaññī chandaṃ datvā khiyyati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:2.2.2: Dhammakamme vematiko chandaṃ datvā khiyyati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:2.2.3: Dhammakamme adhammakammasaññī chandaṃ datvā khiyyati, anāpatti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:2.3.2: “adhammena vā vaggena vā na kammārahassa vā kammaṃ katan”ti jānanto khiyyati,
